defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the slider.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the slider.

ids.description:
The ids of the elements in the machine.
Useful for composition.

name.description: The name of the slider. Useful for form submission.

onValueChangeEnd.description: The callback function for when the value changes ends.

step.description: The step value for the slider.
